naslov: Kuća u Crikvenici 100 metara od mora! (prodaja)
opis: Prodajemo kuću u centru Crikvenice, površine 125 m2 sa tri sobe, tri kupaone, kuhinjom i blagovaonom. Kuća se nalazi 100 metara od mora i ima svoja tri parkirna mjesta u dvorištu, što je rijetkost na toj lokaciji. Izgrađena je 1976. godine, adaptirana 2019. godine, prodaje se potpuno namještena i spremna za korištenje. Također, moguće je ishoditi dozvolu za dogradnju još jednog kata po želji. Energetski certifikat u izradi! Više info na +385 95 829 1188 ili geofly.immobilien@gmail.com Ako želite biti redovito obaviješteni o novim nekretninama u ponudi, pratite nas na Facebook stranici https://www.facebook.com/Geoflyimmobilien English! We are selling a house in the center of Crikvenica, 125 m2 with three bedrooms, three bathrooms, kitchen and dining room. The house is located 100 meters from the sea and has its own three parking spaces in the yard, which is a rarity in this location. It was built in 1976, renovated in 2019, sold fully furnished and ready to use. Also, it is possible to obtain a permit to add another floor if desired. Energy certificate pending! More info at +385 95 829 1188 or geofly.immobilien@gmail.com If you want to be regularly informed about new properties on offer, follow us on the Facebook page https://www.facebook.com/Geoflyimmobilien ID KOD AGENCIJE: 249 Dejan Dejanović Voditelj ureda Mob: 095 829 1188 E-mail: geofly.immobilien@gmail.com www.geofly-immobilien.hr
